icp.algorithm.math

Class HighPassFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • icp.algorithm.math.HighPassFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFilter

    public class HighPassFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements IFilter
    Implementation of High-Pass filter. Very simple and low-computing time. Uses moving average algorithm to filter the signal. Keeps previous output and input of filtered data for computing the next output. Very close results to IIR filter function from DSP-collection.
    Version:
    1.00
    Author:
    Jan Vampol

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      HighPassFilter(double freq, double sampleRate)
      Constructor calculates alpha and timeDelay from given frequency and sample rate.
